Name: Matcha Gotcha
Effect: Target All Foes in Range. Projectile Move. Low Accuracy 1. The User restores hp equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down. Roll 2 Chance Dice to inflict 1st Degree Burn on the Target. If the user is Frozen solid, destroy the ice block.
Description: The user invites the foe to a hebal tea ceremony. As the tea is served and the foe is off guard, the user throws the hot tea on them, then proceeds to enjoy their own cup.
